Low Stress.title: Relaxed State
Low Stress.description: You are managing stress well. Continue your current practices to maintain this balance.

tips.title: Maintenance
tips.description: Keep up with your hobbies and relaxation routines.

tips.title: Preparation
tips.description: Build up resilience now for future busy periods.

tips.title: Enjoyment
tips.description: Take time to fully enjoy this period of calm.

Moderate Stress.title: Manageable Stress
Moderate Stress.description: You are feeling some stress. It's time to use some tools to keep it in check.

tips.title: Prioritize
tips.description: Make a to-do list and focus only on the top 3 most important items.

tips.title: Time Management
tips.description: Use the Pomodoro technique (25min work, 5min break) to focus without burnout.

tips.title: Deep Breathing
tips.description: Practice deep belly breathing for 2 minutes when you feel tension rising.

High Stress.title: High Stress Load
High Stress.description: Your stress levels are high. It is crucial to prioritize stress reduction right now.

tips.title: Stress Fast
tips.description: Cut out visible stressors immediately if possible (e.g., news, social media).

tips.title: Say No
tips.description: Decline any new responsibilities until you feel more balanced.

tips.title: Active Relaxation
tips.description: Engage in progressive muscle relaxation or a long bath to physically soothe your body.
